markdownRemark.html:
The first thing you need to do is add your data to the project. You can do this in multiple ways. One easy way to do it is just copy a column from a spreadsheet containing your data and paste it in the "set data" block.

You can also change the scale of your data to better fit what you want to show. For example, if your data range is from 1 to 6 and you want to use it to..

Now you can read your data with the loop block:

Inside the loop block you set the behavior intended to show your data - what you want to do with it. In this example, we are changing the color of the sprite according to the data we have.

You can also add other blocks to the loop.

... and try it out!

Other things to add:

Adding new lists of data.

Using thingspeak or .csv
